content: wood nymph size yarn women s medium 400 yards gauge little lion head knits sock yarn 9 stitches = 1 in stockinette wildwood flower color needles notions us size 1 / 2 50 mm circulars darning needle or size needed to obtain gauge stitch markers cuff co 64 stitches using old norwegian cast on method or your using your favorite cast on divide stitches evenly 32 stitches per needle and join to work in the round being careful not to twist the yarn and place marker if needed to indicate beginning of round *k1 tbl p1* repeat ribbing for 15 rounds or desired length of cuff left leg needle a knit to last 12 stitches pm begin with row 1 of left leaf lace chart needle b knit to last 12 stitches pm begin with row 1 of left leaf lace chart continue with the left chart until you ve reached 5 or desired calf length right leg needle a begin with row 1 of right leaf lace chart pm knit to end of needle needle b begin with row 1 of right leaf lace chart pm knit to end of round continue with the right chart until you ve reached 5 or desired calf length heel flap heel flap is knit on needle b the instep stitches on needle a can be left on hold this slipstitch heel is worked flat across 32 stitches the first 2 and last 2 stitches are always knit repeat 4 row until there are 16 purl bumps on heel flap sides row 1 rs k2 sl1 k1 to last 2 stitches k2 turn row 2 ws k2 purl to last 2 stitches k2 turn row 3 rs k2 k1 sl1 to last to 2 stitches k2 turn row 4 ws k2 purl to last 2 stitches k2 turn short row heel turn continue knitting on needle b for heel flap you will now use short row to turn the heel row 1 rs sl1 k18 ssk k1 row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 stitch turn before the gap ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 stitch turn before the gap p2tog p1 turn continue working row 3 & 4 back and forth until all stitches have been worked there will be a k2tog on rs and p2tog on ws ending with the ws and there will be 18 stitches left gusset knit across 9 heel turn stitches on needle b place marker this denotes the new beginning of the round begin round and pu and knit into the purl bumps along the edge of the heel flap join instep stitches and continuing with the chart pattern for instep stitches only pu and knit into the purl bumps along other side of the heel flap knit to marker one round is complete now continue decreasing every other round as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on round 2 k one round
